title: Mean
text: The mean of the sum of $$75$$ stress scores is (75)(3) $$=$$ $$225$$

title: Standard Deviation
text: The standard deviation of the sum of $$75$$ stress scores is $$1.15\sqrt{75}$$ $$=$$ $$9.96$$

title: Reminder
text: The smallest total of $$75$$ stress scores is $$75$$, because the smallest single score is one

title: Normal CDF
text: normalcdf (start value $$=$$ $$75$$ ,end value,mean,SD). The probability that the total of $$75$$ scores is less than $$200$$ is about zero.
